ALEPH. Blessed<S>835</S> are the undefiled<S>8549</S> in the way<S>1870</S>, who walk<S>1980</S> in the law<S>8451</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>. <sup>undefiled: or, perfect, or, sincere</sup>
Blessed<S>835</S> are they that keep<S>5341</S> his testimonies<S>5713</S>, and that seek<S>1875</S> him with the whole heart<S>3820</S>.
They also do<S>6466</S> no iniquity<S>5766</S>: they walk<S>1980</S> in his ways<S>1870</S>.
Thou hast commanded<S>6680</S> us to keep<S>8104</S> thy precepts<S>6490</S> diligently<S>3966</S>.
O that<S>305</S> my ways<S>1870</S> were directed<S>3559</S> to keep<S>8104</S> thy statutes<S>2706</S>!
Then shall I not be ashamed<S>954</S>, when I have respect<S>5027</S> unto all thy commandments<S>4687</S>.
I will praise<S>3034</S> thee with uprightness<S>3476</S> of heart<S>3824</S>, when I shall have learned<S>3925</S> thy righteous<S>6664</S> judgments<S>4941</S>. <sup>thy: Heb. judgments of thy righteousness</sup>
I will keep<S>8104</S> thy statutes<S>2706</S>: O forsake<S>5800</S> me not utterly<S>3966</S>.
BETH. Wherewithal shall a young man<S>5288</S> cleanse<S>2135</S> his way<S>734</S>? by taking heed<S>8104</S> thereto according to thy word<S>1697</S>.
With my whole heart<S>3820</S> have I sought<S>1875</S> thee: O let me not wander<S>7686</S> from thy commandments<S>4687</S>.
Thy word<S>565</S> have I hid<S>6845</S> in mine heart<S>3820</S>, that I might not sin<S>2398</S> against thee.
Blessed<S>1288</S> art thou, O LORD<S>3068</S>: teach<S>3925</S> me thy statutes<S>2706</S>.
With my lips<S>8193</S> have I declared<S>5608</S> all the judgments<S>4941</S> of thy mouth<S>6310</S>.
I have rejoiced<S>7797</S> in the way<S>1870</S> of thy testimonies<S>5715</S>, as much as in<S>5921</S> all riches<S>1952</S>.
I will meditate<S>7878</S> in thy precepts<S>6490</S>, and have respect<S>5027</S> unto thy ways<S>734</S>.
I will delight<S>8173</S> myself in thy statutes<S>2708</S>: I will not forget<S>7911</S> thy word<S>1697</S>.
GIMEL. Deal bountifully<S>1580</S> with thy servant<S>5650</S>, that I may live<S>2421</S>, and keep<S>8104</S> thy word<S>1697</S>.
Open<S>1540</S> thou mine eyes<S>5869</S>, that I may behold<S>5027</S> wondrous things<S>6381</S> out of thy law<S>8451</S>. <sup>Open: Heb. Reveal</sup>
I am a stranger<S>1616</S> in the earth<S>776</S>: hide<S>5641</S> not thy commandments<S>4687</S> from me.
My soul<S>5315</S> breaketh<S>1638</S> for the longing<S>8375</S> that it hath unto thy judgments<S>4941</S> at all times<S>6256</S>.
Thou hast rebuked<S>1605</S> the proud<S>2086</S> that are cursed<S>779</S>, which do err<S>7686</S> from thy commandments<S>4687</S>.
Remove<S>1556</S> from me reproach<S>2781</S> and contempt<S>937</S>; for I have kept<S>5341</S> thy testimonies<S>5713</S>.
Princes<S>8269</S> also did sit<S>3427</S> and speak<S>1696</S> against me: but thy servant<S>5650</S> did meditate<S>7878</S> in thy statutes<S>2706</S>.
Thy testimonies<S>5713</S> also are my delight<S>8191</S> and my counsellors<S>582</S> <S>6098</S>. <sup>my counsellors: Heb. men of my counsel</sup>
DALETH. My soul<S>5315</S> cleaveth<S>1692</S> unto the dust<S>6083</S>: quicken<S>2421</S> thou me according to thy word<S>1697</S>.
I have declared<S>5608</S> my ways<S>1870</S>, and thou heardest<S>6030</S> me: teach<S>3925</S> me thy statutes<S>2706</S>.
Make me to understand<S>995</S> the way<S>1870</S> of thy precepts<S>6490</S>: so shall I talk<S>7878</S> of thy wondrous works<S>6381</S>.
My soul<S>5315</S> melteth<S>1811</S> for heaviness<S>8424</S>: strengthen<S>6965</S> thou me according unto thy word<S>1697</S>. <sup>melteth: Heb. droppeth</sup>
Remove<S>5493</S> from me the way<S>1870</S> of lying<S>8267</S>: and grant me thy law<S>8451</S> graciously<S>2603</S>.
I have chosen<S>977</S> the way<S>1870</S> of truth<S>530</S>: thy judgments<S>4941</S> have I laid<S>7737</S> before me.
I have stuck<S>1692</S> unto thy testimonies<S>5715</S>: O LORD<S>3068</S>, put me not to shame<S>954</S>.
I will run<S>7323</S> the way<S>1870</S> of thy commandments<S>4687</S>, when thou shalt enlarge<S>7337</S> my heart<S>3820</S>.
HE. Teach<S>3384</S> me, O LORD<S>3068</S>, the way<S>1870</S> of thy statutes<S>2706</S>; and I shall keep<S>5341</S> it unto the end<S>6118</S>.
Give me understanding<S>995</S>, and I shall keep<S>5341</S> thy law<S>8451</S>; yea, I shall observe<S>8104</S> it with my whole heart<S>3820</S>.
Make me to go<S>1869</S> in the path<S>5410</S> of thy commandments<S>4687</S>; for therein do I delight<S>2654</S>.
Incline<S>5186</S> my heart<S>3820</S> unto thy testimonies<S>5715</S>, and not to covetousness<S>1215</S>.
Turn away<S>5674</S> mine eyes<S>5869</S> from beholding<S>7200</S> vanity<S>7723</S>; and quicken<S>2421</S> thou me in thy way<S>1870</S>. <sup>Turn: Heb. Make to pass</sup>
Stablish<S>6965</S> thy word<S>565</S> unto thy servant<S>5650</S>, who is devoted to thy fear<S>3374</S>.
Turn away<S>5674</S> my reproach<S>2781</S> which I fear<S>3025</S>: for thy judgments<S>4941</S> are good<S>2896</S>.
Behold, I have longed<S>8373</S> after thy precepts<S>6490</S>: quicken<S>2421</S> me in thy righteousness<S>6666</S>.
VAU. Let thy mercies<S>2617</S> come<S>935</S> also unto me, O LORD<S>3068</S>, even thy salvation<S>8668</S>, according to thy word<S>565</S>.
So shall I have wherewith<S>1697</S> to answer<S>6030</S> him that reproacheth<S>2778</S> me: for I trust<S>982</S> in thy word<S>1697</S>. <sup>So: or, So shall I answer him that reproveth me in a thing</sup>
And take<S>5337</S> not the word<S>1697</S> of truth<S>571</S> utterly<S>3966</S> out of my mouth<S>6310</S>; for I have hoped<S>3176</S> in thy judgments<S>4941</S>.
So shall I keep<S>8104</S> thy law<S>8451</S> continually<S>8548</S> for ever<S>5769</S> and ever<S>5703</S>.
And I will walk<S>1980</S> at liberty<S>7342</S>: for I seek<S>1875</S> thy precepts<S>6490</S>. <sup>at liberty: Heb. at large</sup>
I will speak<S>1696</S> of thy testimonies<S>5713</S> also before kings<S>4428</S>, and will not be ashamed<S>954</S>.
And I will delight<S>8173</S> myself in thy commandments<S>4687</S>, which I have loved<S>157</S>.
My hands<S>3709</S> also will I lift up<S>5375</S> unto thy commandments<S>4687</S>, which I have loved<S>157</S>; and I will meditate<S>7878</S> in thy statutes<S>2706</S>.
ZAIN. Remember<S>2142</S> the word<S>1697</S> unto thy servant<S>5650</S>, upon which thou hast caused me to hope<S>3176</S>.
This is my comfort<S>5165</S> in my affliction<S>6040</S>: for thy word<S>565</S> hath quickened<S>2421</S> me.
The proud<S>2086</S> have had me greatly<S>3966</S> in derision<S>3887</S>: yet have I not declined<S>5186</S> from thy law<S>8451</S>.
I remembered<S>2142</S> thy judgments<S>4941</S> of old<S>5769</S>, O LORD<S>3068</S>; and have comforted<S>5162</S> myself.
Horror<S>2152</S> hath taken hold<S>270</S> upon me because of the wicked<S>7563</S> that forsake<S>5800</S> thy law<S>8451</S>.
Thy statutes<S>2706</S> have been my songs<S>2158</S> in the house<S>1004</S> of my pilgrimage<S>4033</S>.
I have remembered<S>2142</S> thy name<S>8034</S>, O LORD<S>3068</S>, in the night<S>3915</S>, and have kept<S>8104</S> thy law<S>8451</S>.
This I had, because I kept<S>5341</S> thy precepts<S>6490</S>.
CHETH. Thou art my portion<S>2506</S>, O LORD<S>3068</S>: I have said<S>559</S> that I would keep<S>8104</S> thy words<S>1697</S>.
I intreated<S>2470</S> thy favour<S>6440</S> with my whole heart<S>3820</S>: be merciful<S>2603</S> unto me according to thy word<S>565</S>. <sup>favour: Heb. face</sup>
I thought<S>2803</S> on my ways<S>1870</S>, and turned<S>7725</S> my feet<S>7272</S> unto thy testimonies<S>5713</S>.
I made haste<S>2363</S>, and delayed<S>4102</S> not to keep<S>8104</S> thy commandments<S>4687</S>.
The bands<S>2256</S> of the wicked<S>7563</S> have robbed<S>5749</S> me: but I have not forgotten<S>7911</S> thy law<S>8451</S>. <sup>bands: or, companies</sup>
At midnight<S>2676</S> <S>3915</S> I will rise<S>6965</S> to give thanks<S>3034</S> unto thee because of thy righteous<S>6664</S> judgments<S>4941</S>.
I am a companion<S>2270</S> of all them that fear<S>3372</S> thee, and of them that keep<S>8104</S> thy precepts<S>6490</S>.
The earth<S>776</S>, O LORD<S>3068</S>, is full<S>4390</S> of thy mercy<S>2617</S>: teach<S>3925</S> me thy statutes<S>2706</S>.
TETH. Thou hast dealt<S>6213</S> well<S>2896</S> with thy servant<S>5650</S>, O LORD<S>3068</S>, according unto thy word<S>1697</S>.
Teach<S>3925</S> me good<S>2898</S> judgment<S>2940</S> and knowledge<S>1847</S>: for I have believed<S>539</S> thy commandments<S>4687</S>.
Before I was afflicted<S>6031</S> I went astray<S>7683</S>: but now have I kept<S>8104</S> thy word<S>565</S>.
Thou art good<S>2896</S>, and doest good<S>2895</S>; teach<S>3925</S> me thy statutes<S>2706</S>.
The proud<S>2086</S> have forged<S>2950</S> a lie<S>8267</S> against me: but I will keep<S>5341</S> thy precepts<S>6490</S> with my whole heart<S>3820</S>.
Their heart<S>3820</S> is as fat<S>2954</S> as grease<S>2459</S>; but I delight<S>8173</S> in thy law<S>8451</S>.
It is good<S>2896</S> for me that I have been afflicted<S>6031</S>; that I might learn<S>3925</S> thy statutes<S>2706</S>.
The law<S>8451</S> of thy mouth<S>6310</S> is better<S>2896</S> unto me than thousands<S>505</S> of gold<S>2091</S> and silver<S>3701</S>.
JOD. Thy hands<S>3027</S> have made<S>6213</S> me and fashioned<S>3559</S> me: give me understanding<S>995</S>, that I may learn<S>3925</S> thy commandments<S>4687</S>.
They that fear<S>3373</S> thee will be glad<S>8055</S> when they see<S>7200</S> me; because I have hoped<S>3176</S> in thy word<S>1697</S>.
I know<S>3045</S>, O LORD<S>3068</S>, that thy judgments<S>4941</S> are right<S>6664</S>, and that thou in faithfulness<S>530</S> hast afflicted<S>6031</S> me. <sup>right: Heb. righteousness</sup>
Let, I pray thee, thy merciful kindness<S>2617</S> be for my comfort<S>5162</S>, according to thy word<S>565</S> unto thy servant<S>5650</S>. <sup>for: Heb. to comfort me</sup>
Let thy tender mercies<S>7356</S> come<S>935</S> unto me, that I may live<S>2421</S>: for thy law<S>8451</S> is my delight<S>8191</S>.
Let the proud<S>2086</S> be ashamed<S>954</S>; for they dealt perversely<S>5791</S> with me without a cause<S>8267</S>: but I will meditate<S>7878</S> in thy precepts<S>6490</S>.
Let those that fear<S>3373</S> thee turn<S>7725</S> unto me, and those that have known<S>3045</S> <S>3045</S> thy testimonies<S>5713</S>.
Let my heart<S>3820</S> be sound<S>8549</S> in thy statutes<S>2706</S>; that I be not ashamed<S>954</S>.
CAPH. My soul<S>5315</S> fainteth<S>3615</S> for thy salvation<S>8668</S>: but I hope<S>3176</S> in thy word<S>1697</S>.
Mine eyes<S>5869</S> fail<S>3615</S> for thy word<S>565</S>, saying<S>559</S>, When wilt thou comfort<S>5162</S> me?
For I am become like a bottle<S>4997</S> in the smoke<S>7008</S>; yet do I not forget<S>7911</S> thy statutes<S>2706</S>.
How many are the days<S>3117</S> of thy servant<S>5650</S>? when wilt thou execute<S>6213</S> judgment<S>4941</S> on them that persecute<S>7291</S> me?
The proud<S>2086</S> have digged<S>3738</S> pits<S>7882</S> for me, which are not after thy law<S>8451</S>.
All thy commandments<S>4687</S> are faithful<S>530</S>: they persecute<S>7291</S> me wrongfully<S>8267</S>; help<S>5826</S> thou me. <sup>faithful: Heb. faithfulness</sup>
They had almost<S>4592</S> consumed<S>3615</S> me upon earth<S>776</S>; but I forsook<S>5800</S> not thy precepts<S>6490</S>.
Quicken<S>2421</S> me after thy lovingkindness<S>2617</S>; so shall I keep<S>8104</S> the testimony<S>5715</S> of thy mouth<S>6310</S>.
LAMED. For ever<S>5769</S>, O LORD<S>3068</S>, thy word<S>1697</S> is settled<S>5324</S> in heaven<S>8064</S>.
Thy faithfulness<S>530</S> is unto all<S>1755</S> generations<S>1755</S>: thou hast established<S>3559</S> the earth<S>776</S>, and it abideth<S>5975</S>. <sup>unto: Heb. to generation and generation</sup> <sup>abideth: Heb. standeth</sup>
They continue<S>5975</S> this day<S>3117</S> according to thine ordinances<S>4941</S>: for all are thy servants<S>5650</S>.
Unless<S>3884</S> thy law<S>8451</S> had been my delights<S>8191</S>, I should then have perished<S>6</S> in mine affliction<S>6040</S>.
I will never<S>5769</S> forget<S>7911</S> thy precepts<S>6490</S>: for with them thou hast quickened<S>2421</S> me.
I am thine, save<S>3467</S> me; for I have sought<S>1875</S> thy precepts<S>6490</S>.
The wicked<S>7563</S> have waited<S>6960</S> for me to destroy<S>6</S> me: but I will consider<S>995</S> thy testimonies<S>5713</S>.
I have seen<S>7200</S> an end<S>7093</S> of all perfection<S>8502</S>: but thy commandment<S>4687</S> is exceeding<S>3966</S> broad<S>7342</S>.
MEM. O how love I<S>157</S> thy law<S>8451</S>! it is my meditation<S>7881</S> all the day<S>3117</S>.
Thou through thy commandments<S>4687</S> hast made me wiser<S>2449</S> than mine enemies<S>341</S>: for they are ever<S>5769</S> with me. <sup>they: Heb. it is ever with me</sup>
I have more understanding<S>7919</S> than all my teachers<S>3925</S>: for thy testimonies<S>5715</S> are my meditation<S>7881</S>.
I understand<S>995</S> more than the ancients<S>2205</S>, because I keep<S>5341</S> thy precepts<S>6490</S>.
I have refrained<S>3607</S> my feet<S>7272</S> from every evil<S>7451</S> way<S>734</S>, that I might keep<S>8104</S> thy word<S>1697</S>.
I have not departed<S>5493</S> from thy judgments<S>4941</S>: for thou hast taught<S>3384</S> me.
How sweet<S>4452</S> are thy words<S>565</S> unto my taste<S>2441</S>! yea, sweeter than honey<S>1706</S> to my mouth<S>6310</S>! <sup>taste: Heb. palate</sup>
Through thy precepts<S>6490</S> I get understanding<S>995</S>: therefore I hate<S>8130</S> every false<S>8267</S> way<S>734</S>.
NUN. Thy word<S>1697</S> is a lamp<S>5216</S> unto my feet<S>7272</S>, and a light<S>216</S> unto my path<S>5410</S>. <sup>lamp: or, candle</sup>
I have sworn<S>7650</S>, and I will perform<S>6965</S> it, that I will keep<S>8104</S> thy righteous<S>6664</S> judgments<S>4941</S>.
I am afflicted<S>6031</S> very much<S>3966</S>: quicken<S>2421</S> me, O LORD<S>3068</S>, according unto thy word<S>1697</S>.
Accept<S>7521</S>, I beseech thee, the freewill offerings<S>5071</S> of my mouth<S>6310</S>, O LORD<S>3068</S>, and teach<S>3925</S> me thy judgments<S>4941</S>.
My soul<S>5315</S> is continually<S>8548</S> in my hand<S>3709</S>: yet do I not forget<S>7911</S> thy law<S>8451</S>.
The wicked<S>7563</S> have laid<S>5414</S> a snare<S>6341</S> for me: yet I erred<S>8582</S> not from thy precepts<S>6490</S>.
Thy testimonies<S>5715</S> have I taken as an heritage<S>5157</S> for ever<S>5769</S>: for they are the rejoicing<S>8342</S> of my heart<S>3820</S>.
I have inclined<S>5186</S> mine heart<S>3820</S> to perform<S>6213</S> thy statutes<S>2706</S> alway<S>5769</S>, even unto the end<S>6118</S>. <sup>to perform: Heb. to do</sup>
SAMECH. I hate<S>8130</S> vain thoughts<S>5588</S>: but thy law<S>8451</S> do I love<S>157</S>.
Thou art my hiding place<S>5643</S> and my shield<S>4043</S>: I hope<S>3176</S> in thy word<S>1697</S>.
Depart<S>5493</S> from me, ye evildoers<S>7489</S>: for I will keep<S>5341</S> the commandments<S>4687</S> of my God<S>430</S>.
Uphold<S>5564</S> me according unto thy word<S>565</S>, that I may live<S>2421</S>: and let me not be ashamed<S>954</S> of my hope<S>7664</S>.
Hold thou me up<S>5582</S>, and I shall be safe<S>3467</S>: and I will have respect<S>8159</S> unto thy statutes<S>2706</S> continually<S>8548</S>.
Thou hast trodden down<S>5541</S> all them that err<S>7686</S> from thy statutes<S>2706</S>: for their deceit<S>8649</S> is falsehood<S>8267</S>.
Thou puttest away<S>7673</S> all the wicked<S>7563</S> of the earth<S>776</S> like dross<S>5509</S>: therefore I love<S>157</S> thy testimonies<S>5713</S>. <sup>puttest: Heb. causest to cease</sup>
My flesh<S>1320</S> trembleth<S>5568</S> for fear<S>6343</S> of thee; and I am afraid<S>3372</S> of thy judgments<S>4941</S>.
AIN. I have done<S>6213</S> judgment<S>4941</S> and justice<S>6664</S>: leave<S>3240</S> me not to mine oppressors<S>6231</S>.
Be surety<S>6148</S> for thy servant<S>5650</S> for good<S>2896</S>: let not the proud<S>2086</S> oppress<S>6231</S> me.
Mine eyes<S>5869</S> fail<S>3615</S> for thy salvation<S>3444</S>, and for the word<S>565</S> of thy righteousness<S>6664</S>.
Deal<S>6213</S> with thy servant<S>5650</S> according unto thy mercy<S>2617</S>, and teach<S>3925</S> me thy statutes<S>2706</S>.
I am thy servant<S>5650</S>; give me understanding<S>995</S>, that I may know<S>3045</S> thy testimonies<S>5713</S>.
It is time<S>6256</S> for thee, LORD<S>3068</S>, to work<S>6213</S>: for they have made void<S>6565</S> thy law<S>8451</S>.
Therefore I love<S>157</S> thy commandments<S>4687</S> above gold<S>2091</S>; yea, above fine gold<S>6337</S>.
Therefore I esteem all thy precepts<S>6490</S> concerning all things to be right<S>3474</S>; and I hate<S>8130</S> every false<S>8267</S> way<S>734</S>.
PE. Thy testimonies<S>5715</S> are wonderful<S>6382</S>: therefore doth my soul<S>5315</S> keep<S>5341</S> them.
The entrance<S>6608</S> of thy words<S>1697</S> giveth light<S>215</S>; it giveth understanding<S>995</S> unto the simple<S>6612</S>.
I opened<S>6473</S> my mouth<S>6310</S>, and panted<S>7602</S>: for I longed<S>2968</S> for thy commandments<S>4687</S>.
Look<S>6437</S> thou upon me, and be merciful<S>2603</S> unto me, as thou usest<S>4941</S> to do unto those that love<S>157</S> thy name<S>8034</S>. <sup>as thou: Heb. according to the custom toward those, etc</sup>
Order<S>3559</S> my steps<S>6471</S> in thy word<S>565</S>: and let not any iniquity<S>205</S> have dominion<S>7980</S> over me.
Deliver<S>6299</S> me from the oppression<S>6233</S> of man<S>120</S>: so will I keep<S>8104</S> thy precepts<S>6490</S>.
Make thy face<S>6440</S> to shine<S>215</S> upon thy servant<S>5650</S>; and teach<S>3925</S> me thy statutes<S>2706</S>.
Rivers<S>6388</S> of waters<S>4325</S> run down<S>3381</S> mine eyes<S>5869</S>, because they keep<S>8104</S> not thy law<S>8451</S>.
TZADDI. Righteous<S>6662</S> art thou, O LORD<S>3068</S>, and upright<S>3477</S> are thy judgments<S>4941</S>.
Thy testimonies<S>5713</S> that thou hast commanded<S>6680</S> are righteous<S>6664</S> and very<S>3966</S> faithful<S>530</S>. <sup>righteous: Heb. righteousness</sup> <sup>faithful: Heb. faithfulness</sup>
My zeal<S>7068</S> hath consumed<S>6789</S> me, because mine enemies<S>6862</S> have forgotten<S>7911</S> thy words<S>1697</S>. <sup>consumed: Heb. cut me off</sup>
Thy word<S>565</S> is very<S>3966</S> pure<S>6884</S>: therefore thy servant<S>5650</S> loveth<S>157</S> it. <sup>pure: Heb. tried, or, refined</sup>
I am small<S>6810</S> and despised<S>959</S>: yet do not I forget<S>7911</S> thy precepts<S>6490</S>.
Thy righteousness<S>6666</S> is an everlasting<S>5769</S> righteousness<S>6664</S>, and thy law<S>8451</S> is the truth<S>571</S>.
Trouble<S>6862</S> and anguish<S>4689</S> have taken hold<S>4672</S> on me: yet thy commandments<S>4687</S> are my delights<S>8191</S>. <sup>taken: Heb. found me</sup>
The righteousness<S>6664</S> of thy testimonies<S>5715</S> is everlasting<S>5769</S>: give me understanding<S>995</S>, and I shall live<S>2421</S>.
KOPH. I cried<S>7121</S> with my whole heart<S>3820</S>; hear<S>6030</S> me, O LORD<S>3068</S>: I will keep<S>5341</S> thy statutes<S>2706</S>.
I cried<S>7121</S> unto thee; save<S>3467</S> me, and I shall keep<S>8104</S> thy testimonies<S>5713</S>. <sup>and I: or, that I may keep</sup>
I prevented<S>6923</S> the dawning of the morning<S>5399</S>, and cried<S>7768</S>: I hoped<S>3176</S> in thy word<S>1697</S>.
Mine eyes<S>5869</S> prevent<S>6923</S> the night watches<S>821</S>, that I might meditate<S>7878</S> in thy word<S>565</S>.
Hear<S>8085</S> my voice<S>6963</S> according unto thy lovingkindness<S>2617</S>: O LORD<S>3068</S>, quicken<S>2421</S> me according to thy judgment<S>4941</S>.
They draw nigh<S>7126</S> that follow<S>7291</S> after mischief<S>2154</S>: they are far<S>7368</S> from thy law<S>8451</S>.
Thou art near<S>7138</S>, O LORD<S>3068</S>; and all thy commandments<S>4687</S> are truth<S>571</S>.
Concerning thy testimonies<S>5713</S>, I have known<S>3045</S> of old<S>6924</S> that thou hast founded<S>3245</S> them for ever<S>5769</S>.
RESH. Consider<S>7200</S> mine affliction<S>6040</S>, and deliver<S>2502</S> me: for I do not forget<S>7911</S> thy law<S>8451</S>.
Plead<S>7378</S> my cause<S>7379</S>, and deliver<S>1350</S> me: quicken<S>2421</S> me according to thy word<S>565</S>.
Salvation<S>3444</S> is far<S>7350</S> from the wicked<S>7563</S>: for they seek<S>1875</S> not thy statutes<S>2706</S>.
Great<S>7227</S> are thy tender mercies<S>7356</S>, O LORD<S>3068</S>: quicken<S>2421</S> me according to thy judgments<S>4941</S>. <sup>Great: or, Many</sup>
Many<S>7227</S> are my persecutors<S>7291</S> and mine enemies<S>6862</S>; yet do I not decline<S>5186</S> from thy testimonies<S>5715</S>.
I beheld<S>7200</S> the transgressors<S>898</S>, and was grieved<S>6962</S>; because they kept<S>8104</S> not thy word<S>565</S>.
Consider<S>7200</S> how I love<S>157</S> thy precepts<S>6490</S>: quicken<S>2421</S> me, O LORD<S>3068</S>, according to thy lovingkindness<S>2617</S>.
Thy word<S>1697</S> is true<S>571</S> from the beginning<S>7218</S>: and every one of thy righteous<S>6664</S> judgments<S>4941</S> endureth for ever<S>5769</S>. <sup>Thy word: Heb. The beginning of thy word is true</sup>
SCHIN. Princes<S>8269</S> have persecuted<S>7291</S> me without a cause<S>2600</S>: but my heart<S>3820</S> standeth in awe<S>6342</S> of thy word<S>1697</S>.
I rejoice<S>7797</S> at thy word<S>565</S>, as one that findeth<S>4672</S> great<S>7227</S> spoil<S>7998</S>.
I hate<S>8130</S> and abhor<S>8581</S> lying<S>8267</S>: but thy law<S>8451</S> do I love<S>157</S>.
Seven times<S>7651</S> a day<S>3117</S> do I praise<S>1984</S> thee because of thy righteous<S>6664</S> judgments<S>4941</S>.
Great<S>7227</S> peace<S>7965</S> have they which love<S>157</S> thy law<S>8451</S>: and nothing shall offend<S>4383</S> them. <sup>nothing: Heb. they shall have no stumblingblock</sup>
LORD<S>3068</S>, I have hoped<S>7663</S> for thy salvation<S>3444</S>, and done<S>6213</S> thy commandments<S>4687</S>.
My soul<S>5315</S> hath kept<S>8104</S> thy testimonies<S>5713</S>; and I love<S>157</S> them exceedingly<S>3966</S>.
I have kept<S>8104</S> thy precepts<S>6490</S> and thy testimonies<S>5713</S>: for all my ways<S>1870</S> are before thee.
TAU. Let my cry<S>7440</S> come near<S>7126</S> before<S>6440</S> thee, O LORD<S>3068</S>: give me understanding<S>995</S> according to thy word<S>1697</S>.
Let my supplication<S>8467</S> come<S>935</S> before<S>6440</S> thee: deliver<S>5337</S> me according to thy word<S>565</S>.
My lips<S>8193</S> shall utter<S>5042</S> praise<S>8416</S>, when thou hast taught<S>3925</S> me thy statutes<S>2706</S>.
My tongue<S>3956</S> shall speak<S>6030</S> of thy word<S>565</S>: for all thy commandments<S>4687</S> are righteousness<S>6664</S>.
Let thine hand<S>3027</S> help<S>5826</S> me; for I have chosen<S>977</S> thy precepts<S>6490</S>.
I have longed<S>8373</S> for thy salvation<S>3444</S>, O LORD<S>3068</S>; and thy law<S>8451</S> is my delight<S>8191</S>.
Let my soul<S>5315</S> live<S>2421</S>, and it shall praise<S>1984</S> thee; and let thy judgments<S>4941</S> help<S>5826</S> me.
I have gone astray<S>8582</S> like a lost<S>6</S> sheep<S>7716</S>; seek<S>1245</S> thy servant<S>5650</S>; for I do not forget<S>7911</S> thy commandments<S>4687</S>.
